title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP- Harbour Energy, Foresight Group Holdings, Stagecoach Group,
text:
â€© July 5 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Harbour Energy, Foresight Group Holdings and Stagecoach Group on Monday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* Harbour Energy Plc : Peel Hunt raises to add from hold

* Foresight Group Holdings Ltd : Peel Hunt initiates coverage with buy rating

* KBC Groep NV : Kepler Cheuvreux raises to hold from reduce

* Legrand : Deutsche Bank raises to buy from hold

* Stagecoach Group Plc : HSBC raises to hold from reduce

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* ABB Ltd : Jefferies raises price target to CHF 25 from CHF 23

* Accell Group NV : Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 52 from EUR 47

* Adidas AG : Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 320 from EUR 295

* Anglo American : Barclays raises target price to 3820p from 3800p
